title: Garden , plants and flowers : quarterly purchase spend in the UK 2013 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Expenditure in million GBP in the y axis.
The Expenditure in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2018 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2013.
The maximum Quarter Q3 2018 has got 1.64 times higher Expenditure in million GBP than the minimum Quarter Q3 2013.
min_summary: This bar chart has 26 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Expenditure in million GBP in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q3 2018 has the highest Expenditure in million GBP and Q3 2013 has the lowest Expenditure in million GBP.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Expenditure in million GBP in the y axis.
The Expenditure in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 2018 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2013.
The maximum Quarter Q3 2018 has got 1.64 times higher Expenditure in million GBP than the minimum Quarter Q3 2013.
max_summary: This bar chart has 26 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Expenditure in million GBP in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q3 2018 has the highest Expenditure in million GBP and Q3 2013 has the lowest Expenditure in million GBP.
There is a difference of 581.0 between the maximum Quarter Q3 2018 and minimum Quarter Q3 2013.
Quarter Q3 2018 is higher than any other Quarters with value 1484.0, followed by Q4 2018, and Q1 2019. Down to Quarter Q3 2013 with the lowest value 903.0.
Over the past 26 Quarters, the Expenditure in million GBP has declined.
The lowest value 903.0 at Q3 2013 is almost 1.22 times smaller than the average value 1219.15.
The Expenditure in million GBP is 31698.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
